actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 1-octadecanaminium, N,N-dimethyl-N-octadecyl-,(Sp-4-2)-[29H,31H-phthalocyanine-2-sulfonato(3-)-kN29,kN30,kN31, kN32]cuprate(1-).

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 1-octadecanaminium, N,N-dimethyl-N-octadecyl-,(Sp-4-2)-[29H,31H-phthalocyanine-2-sulfonato(3-)-kN29,kN30,kN31, kN32]cuprate(1-).

titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 1-octadecanaminium, N,N-dimethyl-N-octadecyl-,(Sp-4-2)-[29H,31H-phthalocyanine-2-sulfonato(3-)-kN29,kN30,kN31, kN32]cuprate(1-).
